DOC.brief_summary: The general objective study estimate systemic pharmacokinetics mannitol single multiple dose IDPM 400 mg adult paediatric cystic fibrosis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Inhaled Mannitol Cystic Fibrosis Patients
DOC.criteria: Have give write informed consent participate study accordance local regulation Have confirm diagnosis cystic fibrosis ( sweat test and/or genotype ) Be age > 6 year ( 611 paediatrics , 1217 adolescent 18 year adults ) Have FEV1 > 30 % < 90 % predict Be investigator , site personnel directly affiliate study , immediate family . Immediate family define spouse , parent , child sibling , whether biologically legally adopt . Be consider `` terminally ill '' list lung transplantation Have lung transplant Be use nebulised hypertonic saline Have significant episode haemoptysis ( > 60 mL ) three month prior enrolment Have myocardial infarction three month prior enrolment Have cerebral vascular accident three month prior enrolment Have major ocular surgery three month prior enrolment Have major abdominal , chest brain surgery three month prior enrolment Have know cerebral , aortic abdominal aneurysm Be breast feed pregnant , plan become pregnant study Be use unreliable form contraception ( female patient risk pregnancy ) Be participate another investigative drug study , parallel , within 4 week study entry ( except inhale mannitol ) Not able maintain mannitol free diet Day 2 Day 8 treatment phase . Have know allergy mannitol Be use beta blocker Have uncontrolled hypertension systolic blood pressure > 190 / diastolic blood pressure > 100 Have condition situation Investigator 's opinion may put subject significant risk , may confound result may interfere significantly patient 's participation study Be MTT positive .
